question: where is dakar located on the world map
api_result: Dakar is located on the westernmost point of the African continent, in Senegal. It is situated on the Cape Verde Peninsula, along the Atlantic Ocean. On a world map, you can find Dakar at approximately 14.6928° N latitude and 17.4467° W longitude. It serves as the capital city of Senegal and is an important cultural and economic center in West Africa.
